sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_fd36b18ddb3e3300e294294648961942
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.VFXUpdateSetUtils</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>VFXUpdateSetUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var VFXUpdateSetUtils = Class.create();
VFXUpdateSetUtils.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	
	preview: function(rusSysID) {
		var rus = new GlideRecord('sys_remote_update_set');
		rus.get(rusSysID);
		if(rus.state=='loaded') {
			var usPreview = new UpdateSetPreviewAjax();
			usPreview.previewRemoteUpdateSetAgain(rus);
		}
	},
	
	commit: function(rusSysID) {
		var rus = new GlideRecord('sys_remote_update_set');
		rus.get(rusSysID);
		if(rus.state=='previewed' && rus.collisions==0) {
			var worker = new GlideUpdateSetWorker();
			var lus = new GlideRecord('sys_update_set');
			var lus_sysid = worker.remoteUpdateSetCommit(lus, rus, rus.update_source.url);
			var usCommit = new UpdateSetCommitAjax();
			usCommit._copyUpdateXML(lus_sysid, rus.sys_id);
			rus.update();
			worker.setUpdateSetSysId(lus_sysid);
			worker.setProgressName(gs.getMessage("Committing update set: {0}", rus.name));
			worker.setBackground(false);
			worker.start();
			return lus_sysid;
		}
	},
	
	callREST: function(message, method, keyValue) {
		var r = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2(message, method);
		var map = keyValue.split("=");
		r.setStringParameter(map[0].toString(),map[1].toString());
		var response = r.execute();
		var responseBody = response.getBody();
		var httpStatus = response.getStatusCode();
		gs.print(httpStatus);
		if(httpStatus==200) {
			 return new JSON().decode(responseBody);
		} else
			return '';
	},
	
	createRemoteSet: function(lus) {
		var retrievedUpdateSet = new GlideRecord('sys_remote_update_set');
		retrievedUpdateSet.initialize();
		retrievedUpdateSet.description = lus.description;
		retrievedUpdateSet.name = lus.name;
		retrievedUpdateSet.release_date = lus.release_date;
		retrievedUpdateSet.remote_sys_id = lus.sys_id;
		retrievedUpdateSet.application = lus.application; 
		retrievedUpdateSet.description = 'This remote set is created by VFX flow.\n'+retrievedUpdateSet.description;
		var scopeGr = new GlideRecord('sys_scope');
		scopeGr.get(lus.application);
		if (scopeGr.isValid()) {
			retrievedUpdateSet.application_name = scopeGr.name;
			retrievedUpdateSet.application_scope = scopeGr.scope;
			retrievedUpdateSet.application_version = scopeGr.version;
		}
		var retrievedUpdateSetSysId = retrievedUpdateSet.insert();
		return retrievedUpdateSetSysId;
	},
	
	createCustomerUpdate: function(obj, remoteSetSysID) {
		var custUpdate = new GlideRecord('sys_update_xml');
		custUpdate.initialize();
		custUpdate.target_name = obj.target_name;
		custUpdate.sys_updated_on = obj.sys_updated_on;
		custUpdate.type = obj.type;
		custUpdate.update_set = '';
		custUpdate.view = obj.view;
		custUpdate.sys_updated_by = obj.sys_updated_by;
		custUpdate.update_guid_history = obj.update_guid_history;
		custUpdate.payload = obj.payload;
		custUpdate.sys_created_on = obj.sys_created_on;
		custUpdate.action = obj.action;
		custUpdate.sys_created_by = obj.sys_created_by;
		custUpdate.table = obj.table;
		custUpdate.comments = obj.comments;
		custUpdate.sys_mod_count = obj.sys_mod_count;
		custUpdate.replace_on_upgrade = obj.replace_on_upgrade;
		custUpdate.sys_tags = obj.sys_tags;
		custUpdate.sys_recorded_at = obj.sys_recorded_at;
		custUpdate.update_guid = obj.update_guid;
		custUpdate.application = obj.application;
		custUpdate.name = obj.name;
		custUpdate.remote_update_set = remoteSetSysID;
		custUpdate.update_domain = obj.update_domain;
		custUpdate.payload_hash = obj.payload_hash;
		custUpdate.category = obj.category;
		custUpdate.insert();
	},
	
	checkPreview: function(remoteUpdateSetID){
		
		var grPreviewProblem = new GlideRecord('sys_update_preview_problem');
		grPreviewProblem.addQuery('remote_update_set',remoteUpdateSetID);
		grPreviewProblem.query();
		if(grPreviewProblem.next()){
			return false;
		}
		return true;
	},
	
	insertRecord: function(tableName,obj){
		
		var grObj = new GlideRecord(tableName);
		grObj.initialize();
		for(var col in grObj)
			grObj[col] = obj[col];
		return grObj.insert();
		 
	},
	

    type: 'VFXUpdateSetUtils'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-07-20 18:55:37</sys_created_on><sys_id>fd36b18ddb3e3300e294294648961942</sys_id><sys_mod_count>16</sys_mod_count><sys_name>VFXUpdateSetUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_fd36b18ddb3e3300e294294648961942</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>subhadip.bagchi@vodafone.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-10-15 15:04:01</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_dictionary_u_pull_update_set_u_source_local_update_set_name</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>subhadip.bagchi@vodafone.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-10-15 14:48:27</sys_updated_on><table_reference>false</table_reference><text_index>false</text_index><unique>false</unique><use_dependent_field>false</use_dependent_field><use_dynamic_default>false</use_dynamic_default><use_reference_qualifier>simple</use_reference_qualifier><virtual>false</virtual><widget/><write_roles/><xml_view>false</xml_view></sys_dictionary></record_update>
